nodes.text: A Nightsister Tower was a tall structure the Nightsisters would build on their homeworld of Dathomir. It was a large lighted tower made of dathomirian wood, sedimentary ore and siliclastic ore.

At the time of the Galactic Civil War, schematics to produce such towers could be bought from a vendor of the Singing Mountain Clan—eccentric customers from other planets would sometimes use these structures as exotic city decorations.
